name: Balloonie
description:
After being accidentally let go by a child, a balloon continues his journey though out space in search for a way home.

This is an early version of an adventure game (just the intro chapter) we are making. We are a small team so any feedback would be great! :)

The aspect ratio is 16:9 so there could be some strangeness if you use other resolutions. Also there is no inventory yet so use "m" if you get to the map.
